message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it's a great deal and will be very beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price, however, I can't go that low.  Could you do $160? It's a really fair offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $140? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
